publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1199.1 Carolyn Leckie: Closure of the Queen Mother's Hospital-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1199) in the name of Pauline McNeill, insert at end "and further believes that there continues to be a need for consultant obstetric services on an adult acute site on the south side of Glasgow and that strategies to ensure the continuation and improvement of all existing consultant maternity sites must be found." Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1199.1 Closure of the Queen Mother's Hospital (lodged on 27 April 2004) Frances Curran*

S2M-1199.1 Carolyn Leckie: Closure of the Queen Mother's Hospital-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1199) in the name of Pauline McNeill, insert at end "and further believes that there continues to be a need for consultant obstetric services on an adult acute site on the south side of Glasgow and that strategies to ensure the continuation and improvement of all existing consultant maternity sites must be found." Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Frances Curran
